This website contains R analyses and results used for the manuscript *Dietary restriction fails to extend life in stressful environments*, authored by Zajitschek, F, Zajitschek, SRK, Vasconcelos, ACO & Bonduriansky, R. Functional Ecology, 2023. doi: 10.1111/1365-2435.14389

Data are available at Dryad: http://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.rv15dv4d3

## Survival (females and males, F0 and F1)
Click this link: **[Survival analysis](survival.html)** to view the survival analyses.

## Reproduction I: Female fecundity (F0 and F1)
Click this link: **[Fecundity analysis](fecundity.html)** to view the female fecundity analyses.

## Reproduction II: Male mating behaviour (F0, F1, F2, F3)
Click this link: **[Mating behaviour analysis](matingbehaviour.html)** to view the male mating behaviour analyses.
